title: Subject Object Validation
description: Validation schema for subject objects. A subject at Cal Poly represents a department that often offers a major or minor.

_id.description: the unique identifier for the subject object

term_id.description: the term id associated with the subject

college_id.description: the college id associated with the subject

catalogue_url.description: the url to the subject's catalogue page (useful for end users)

courses.description: an array of course ids associated with the subject

url.description: the url to the subject's page (useful for end users)
